metadata.title: CVE-2020-14147 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow in the getnum function in lua_struct.c in Redis before6.0.3 allows context-dependent attackers with permission to run Lua code ina Redis session to cause a denial of service (memory corruption andapplication crash) or possibly bypass intended sandbox restrictions via alarge number, which triggers a stack-based buffer overflow. NOTE: thisissue exists because of a CVE-2015-8080 regression.

criterions.comment: redis package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
